desc: As the most popular image-editing application on the market today, Adobe Photoshop is an indispensable part of any creative designer’s toolkit. Mastering Photoshop for photo retouching or general design work should be the first step on your path to a career in the visual design field. Learn Adobe Photoshop CC by building cool creative projects that teach you how to:
title: Learn Adobe Photoshop CC for Visual Communication: Adobe Certified Associate Exam Preparation (Adobe Certified Associate (ACA))
